TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件，每個上可見。The event is raised for each that is visible on a . 若要改善效能，請在 設定屬性變更而不是直接存取的資料格中的資料格的外觀。To improve performance, set the properties in a to change the appearance of the cell instead of directly accessing a cell in the . 如果您以手動方式繪製儲存格，請設定屬性`true`。If you manually paint the cell, set the property to `true`. 如果您未設定至`true`，資料格會透過您的自訂繪製。If you do not set to `true`, the cell will paint over your customizations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md)。For more information, see [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/VB/form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更目前的框線所設定的屬性屬性設為其中的值。Change the borders of the current by setting the properties of the property to one of the values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: A that represents the area of the that needs to be repainted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性代表的區域，需要重新繪製。The property represents the area of the that needs to be repainted. 比方說，如果使用者涵蓋整個與另一個視窗，然後發現，和代表整個。For example, if a user covers the entire with another window, and then uncovers it, then represents the entire . 如果使用者涵蓋的範圍縮小，然後發現，和表示所涵蓋的小型區域。If a user covers a small area of the , and then uncovers it, then represents the small area that was covered. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#302](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#302)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#302](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#302)]
